29 class NetworkInfoProviderEngineInterface {
30 public:
31 
35  enum class NetworkStatus {
36 
40  UNKNOWN,
44  DISCONNECTED,
48  DISCONNECTING,
52  CONNECTED,
56  CONNECTING
57  };
58 
59  virtual void networkInfoChanged( NetworkStatus status, int wifiSignalStrength ) = 0;
60 };
61 
62 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const NetworkInfoProviderEngineInterface::NetworkStatus& status) {
63  switch (status) {
64  case NetworkInfoProviderEngineInterface::NetworkStatus::UNKNOWN:
65  stream << "UNKNOWN";
66  break;
67  case NetworkInfoProviderEngineInterface::NetworkStatus::DISCONNECTED:
68  stream << "DISCONNECTED";
69  break;
70  case NetworkInfoProviderEngineInterface::NetworkStatus::DISCONNECTING:
71  stream << "DISCONNECTING";
72  break;
73  case NetworkInfoProviderEngineInterface::NetworkStatus::CONNECTED:
74  stream << "CONNECTED";
75  break;
76  case NetworkInfoProviderEngineInterface::NetworkStatus::CONNECTING:
77  stream << "CONNECTING";
78  break;
79  }
80  return stream;
81 }
